description: Adds an Amazon CloudWatch log stream to monitor application configuration errors.

parameters.name: ApplicationName
parameters.description: The Kinesis Data Analytics application name.

parameters.name: CloudWatchLoggingOption
parameters.description: Provides the Amazon CloudWatch log stream Amazon Resource Name (ARN). The ARN of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages.

nested_params.name: LogStreamARN
nested_params.description: The ARN of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages.

nested_items.name: ApplicationVersionId
nested_items.description: The new version ID of the SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application. Kinesis Data Analytics updates the ApplicationVersionId each time you change the CloudWatch logging options.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionDescriptions
nested_items.description: The descriptions of the current CloudWatch logging options for the SQL-based Kinesis Data Analytics application.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLoggingOptionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CloudWatch logging option description.

nested_items.name: LogStreamARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages.

nested_items.name: RoleARN
nested_items.description: The IAM ARN of the role to use to send application messages.
